title: What solutions to climate change would Democratic lawmakers pursue, if they had the chance? - Quora

response.answer_text: The obvious solution is to create a NASA like department of government or possibly delegate it to NASA the development of new green technologies. If you set aside all the propaganda NASA creates 4 dollars worth of value for every dollar invested. Many calculate it as much more than 4 dollars for every dollar invested. That creates jobs. It creates businesses to hire people. It increases taxes revenue. It puts us… maybe keeps us on top of the technology heap as well as sales of those products around the world. Its a no brainer.
